title: Just Got Paid!...$220 to blow whats the best available card

posts.post_title: Just Got Paid!...$220 to blow whats the best available card
posts.post_content:
Just got paid !!!! So im trying this practice again, as it worked last time.

I have roughly $220.00 available and im looking for the best card / cards that I will be offered.

I was able to grab a low grade Ty cobb last time and im looking for the same this time around:

- Must be graded authentic - 2
- Players that im looking for:
       - Ty Cobb
       - Cy Young
       - Christie Mathewson
      

Let me know whats available Thanks guys!
